subproject.description: The proposed project will align with key disaster management projects and programmes currently under implementation in Nepal and will also improve the adaptive value of ongoing government, bilateral and multilateral investments in priority vulnerable communities which are most affected by climate related extreme events.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
